title: McVernon Umbrella Corporation
text:
Australian researchers with international collaborators work in consortia to develop modelling in infectious diseases to assist planning in policy and practice. These consortia are represented on this website.
For more information such as governance, people and projects, and specific publications, select from the individual consortia below.

title: McVernon Umbrella Corporation
text:
Current consortia




Supporting Participatory Evidence generation to Control Transmissible diseases in our Region Using Modelling







Strengthening Preparedness in the Asia-Pacific Region through Knowledge

title: McVernon Umbrella Corporation
text:
Past consortia




Policy Relevant Infectious disease Simulation and Mathematical Modelling
